Create a custom company structure

Old way

Tracking employee courses in a large company structure can be impossible with any other out of the-box solution.

Coursetto way

Create your company organization tree anyway you like and place managers to create micro training environments.

Graphs!

Track all your lower tiers. Set mangers to higher tier and deligate training.

Course Creation

Pay per private courses your company creates

Anyone can create courses

Allow anyone in your company to create and manage courses making custom content a breeze on desktop or mobile.

You can always restrict anyones access to disable creating, purchasing and managing of users.

Course Marketplace

Pay per user course taken

No subscription necessary

No time to build a course and just need something standard? Then head over to the course marketplace.

Course Distribution

Your company structure is on the right. Watch your price fluctuate as you turn off departments that do not need to take the course you are adding. The price is just an estimate of credits needed to be purchased. Credits are only used when a user actually takes a course. Users get an unlimited amount of times to take a course. Once purchased the course will appear for any "on" departments.
